Row.Text: Can not build any military unit, instead you will always own 6 Undead Units. [NEWLINE]City's [ICON_Strength] Defense and [ICON_Ranged] Ranged Strength will increase with you Technology.[NEWLINE]***PLEASE NOTICE THAT RANGE UNDEAD UNIT CAN NOT ATTACK UNTIL EQUIPPED WITH RANGE WEAPON***
Dark Souls' unique district: Firelink Shrine
Replace Holy Site. [NEWLINE]Enjoy ALL the Adjacent Bonuses of other normal districts. Extra Domestic [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route bonuses. [NEWLINE]Unique District Project "Firekeepers Soul".
Replace Airport(Replace the name of Airport). [NEWLINE]Undead can teleport between Lit Bonfire.
Replace Scout. Using for transport Equipments and Weapons. Cannot earn any EXP in normal circumstances.
Replace all normal land militay units. An expensive and useless Unit .

The Chosen Undead. [NEWLINE]Soul: When defeating an enemy unit, gain [ICON_Faith] Faith equal to 50% that unit's base [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength. [NEWLINE]Undead: Will resurrect at player's capital city on the next turn once they get killed. [NEWLINE]Equipment: Can be strengthened by Equipments and escorted units will enjoy the same Movement speed with Undead.

The Chosen Undead. Can not attack without range equipments. [NEWLINE]Soul: When defeating an enemy unit, gain [ICON_Faith] Faith equal to 50% that unit's base [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength. [NEWLINE]Undead: Will resurrect at player's capital city on the next turn once they get killed. [NEWLINE]Equipment: Can be strengthened by Equipments; escorted units will enjoy the same Movement speed with Undead.

Cities do not incur war weariness. Can purchase Undead's Exclusive Equipments by Faith [ICON_Faith] (Equipments only works on Undead Units). [NEWLINE]Lordvessel: Civic Rapid Deployment and Tech Advance Flight will unlocked at the next turn after the first time you enter an new Era.
Can purchase Undead's Exclusive Equipments by Faith [ICON_Faith] (Equipments only works on Undead Units).

10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Melee Weapon, Anti Cavalry. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against Cavalry Unit. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Standard spear used commonly by soldiers. Long reach, and can be used with shield up. [NEWLINE]Effective against Cavalry, and hits for high damage at the right moment of an enemy's swing. But the hit radius is small, and it is easily blocked by shields.

35 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Melee Weapon, Anti Cavalry. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against Cavalry Unit. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A long-hilted spear with a barbed point. Long reach, and can be used with shield up. [NEWLINE]Effective against Cavalry, and can hit for high damage at the right moment of an enemy's swing. But the hit radius is small, and it is easily blocked by shields.

55 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Melee Weapon, Anti Cavalry. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against Cavalry Unit. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The silver knights of Anor Londo guard the city using this beautifully slender weapon. [NEWLINE]The spear can be wielded by both hands in a focused thrust that uses one's body weight, or swung in a large sweeping motion.

80 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Melee Weapon, Anti Cavalry. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against Cavalry Unit. +20 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength vs. fortified defender. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Cross spear born from the soul of Ornstein, a Dragonslayer guarding Anor Londo cathedral. [NEWLINE]Inflicts lightning damage; effective against dragons. Two-handed thrust relies on cross and buries spear deep within a dragon's hide, and sends human foes flying.

5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Melee Weapon, Anti Spear. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against Spear Unit. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A simple wooden club. This simple bladeless strike weapon is effective against most foes, is easily handled, and can break the guard of a shield. [NEWLINE]However, a single miss makes one wide open, so timing and proximities are crucial.

25 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Melee Weapon, Anti Spear. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against Spear Unit. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Iron hammer with a protrusive pommel. Standard weapon for clerics. [NEWLINE]This simple bladeless strike weapon is effective against most foes, and can break the guard of a shield. However, one miss leaves one wide open.

60 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Melee Weapon, Anti Spear. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against Spear Unit. Can pushes defending enemy units back from their hex in any battle where they score more damage. Defenders that cannot retreat suffer additional damage. -1 Movement. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Demon weapon built from the stone archtrees. Used by lesser demons at North Undead Asylum. [NEWLINE]This hammer is imbued with no special power, but can merrily beat foes to a pulp, providing you have the strength to wield it.

90 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Melee Weapon, Anti Spear. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against Spear Unit. +75 Combat Strength vs. District Defence. Can pushes defending enemy units back from their hex in any battle where they score more damage. Defenders that cannot retreat suffer additional damage. -1 Movement. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Created from an everlasting dragon tooth. Legendary great hammer of Havel the Rock. [NEWLINE]The dragon tooth will never break as it is harder than stone, and it can destory wall by only one hit.

15 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Melee Weapon, Anti Warrior Class. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against Warrior Class Unit. -1 Movement. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This larger type of greatsword is normally wielded with two hands due to its weight. [NEWLINE]This highly flexible greatsword can be used to attack in swings or thrusts.

45 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Melee Weapon, Anti Warrior Class. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against Warrior Class Unit. Equipped Unit will not suffer combat penalties when damaged. -1 Movement. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]One of the gigantic straight greatswords. [NEWLINE]As the name suggests, the Zweihander is held with two hands, but its wielder must still be inhumanly strong. It is this great weight that sends foes flying when hit solidly.

60 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Melee Weapon, Anti Warrior Class. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against Warrior Class Unit. Equipped Unit will not suffer combat penalties when damaged. -1 Movement. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Greatsword of the black knights who wander Lordran. Used to face chaos demons. [NEWLINE]The large motion that puts the weight of the body into the attack reflects the great size of their adversaries long ago.

85 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Melee Weapon, Anti Warrior Class. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against Warrior Class Unit. Equipped Unit will not suffer combat penalties when damaged. -1 Movement. Adjacent enemy units receive -10 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This greatsword belonged to Lord Gwyn's Knight Artorias, who fell to the abyss. [NEWLINE]Swallowed by the Dark with its master, this sword is tainted by the abyss, and now its strength reflects its wielder's humanity.

10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Melee Weapon, Anti Range. +7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against Range Unit. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This small straight sword is widely used, to an extent only matched by the longsword. [NEWLINE]An accessible sword which inflicts consistent regular damage and high slash damage, making it applicable to a variety of situations.

30 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Melee Weapon, Anti Range. +7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against Range Unit. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This standard longsword, belonging to Solaire of Astora, is of high quality, is well-forged, and has been kept in good repair. [NEWLINE]Easy to use and dependable, but unlikely to live up to its grandiose name.

55 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Melee Weapon, Anti Range. +7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against Range Unit. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The silver knights of Anor Londo guard the city using this beautifully slender weapon. [NEWLINE]Its chain attacks, in which the wielder takes great advancing steps and makes use of his bodyweight, are deadly even in single hits.

75 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Melee Weapon, Anti Range. +7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against Range Unit. +20 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength to Undead units within 2 tiles. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Sword born from the soul of the great grey wolf Sif, guardian of the grave of the Abysswalker Knight Artorias. [NEWLINE]Sir Artorias hunted the Darkwraiths, and his sword strikes harder against dark servants.
5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Range Weapon, +1 [ICON_Range] Range. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Small bow. Standard projectile weapon. Range Undeads need Equip to use.

20 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Range Weapon, +1 [ICON_Range] Range. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Bow born from the soul of the Dark Sun Gwyndolin, Darkmoon deity who watches over the abandoned city of Gods, Anor Londo. [NEWLINE]This golden bow is imbued with powerful magic and is most impressive with Moonlight Arrows.
50 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Range Weapon, +2 [ICON_Range] Range. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Bow of the Dragonslayers, led by Hawkeye Gough, one of Gwyn's Four Knights.

65 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Range Weapon, +5 [ICON_Range] Range. +20 [ICON_Ranged] Ranged Strength when attacking. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Greatbow used by Hawkeye Gough, of Lord Gwyn's Four Knights, for dragon slaying. [NEWLINE]This bow is larger than even those used by the famed Dragonslayers. Only their leader, Gough, had the strength to handle it.

20 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength Range Weapon, +1 [ICON_Range] Range. +10 [ICON_Ranged] Ranged Strength when attacking. Only Ciaran Knows the True Power behind this Weapon. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Curved sword used by the Lord's Blade Ciaran, one of Gwyn's Four Knights. [NEWLINE]Ciaran brandishes her sword in a mesmerizing dance, etching the darkness with dire streaks of gold.
+20 [ICON_Strength] Combat Bonus from Greatsword of Artorias.
+7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking ranged and siege units.
{1_Amount} Combat Strength when adjacent to an enemy Abyss GreatSword.
+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending against ranged attacks. +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending in Woods, Jungle, Hills, or Marsh.

+8 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending against ranged attacks and +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against melee attack. +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength defence when occupying a district or Fort.

+12 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending against range attack and +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against melee attack. +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending district attack. -1 Movement.
+3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending melee attack.
+6 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending melee attack.
+10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending melee attack. -1 Movement.
+5 [ICON_Strength] Melee Combat Strength when attacking. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Rare pine which emits golden sparks. Applies lightning to right-hand weapon.
Attacking melee units ignore Walls and immediately assault the city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Hexed pine resin. Applies dark flame to right-hand weapon.
Attacking melee units do full damage to the city's Walls. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Pale pine resin that faintly glimmers. Temporarily applies magic to right-hand weapon.

Range Unit Support Equipment. +5 [ICON_Ranged] Range Strength against damaged units. +1 [ICON_Range] Range. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Arrow with point dipped in poison. Ensures the demise of prey in a hunt, or the target in an assassination. [NEWLINE]Once an enemy is poisoned, one need only wait.

Range Unit Support Equipment. +10 [ICON_Ranged] Range Strength. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Giant dragon-hunting arrows, resembling iron spears. Used by Hawkeye Gough and his Dragonslayers, they puncture human flesh easily.

Range Unit Support Equipment. +10 [ICON_Ranged] Range Strength. Can pushes defending enemy units back from their hex in any battle where they score more damage. Defenders that cannot retreat suffer additional damage. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Great arrow used by Hawkeye Gough, one of Lord Gwyn's Four Knights, for dragon slaying. Requires Greatbow. [NEWLINE]Gough personally crafts each stone tip, and wraps the shaft tightly with tree bark.

Range Unit Support Equipment. +15 [ICON_Ranged] Range Strength vs. District Defence. +1 [ICON_Range] Range. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Arrow granted to those bound by Covenant to the Dark Sun Gwyndolin, Lord Gwyn's lastborn. Moonlight Arrows glow silver, and inflict magic damage.

Range Unit Support Equipment. +1 Movement, Unit get Stealth Ability, +10 [ICON_Ranged] Range Strength against damaged units. Can draw out the hidden power in Gold Tracer. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A dark silver dagger used by the Lord's Blade Ciaran, of Gwyn's Four Knights. [NEWLINE]The victim is first distracted by dazzling streaks of the Gold Tracer, then stung by the vicious poison of this dagger.

+2 Movement. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This ring was named after Havel the Rock, Lord Gwyn's old battlefield compatriot. [NEWLINE]Havel's men wore the ring to express faith in their leader and to carry a heavier load.

+10 HP healing for Equipped unit. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Ring made of an ancient tiny red jewel. Grants small heal bonus to HP. [NEWLINE]Rings grant powers large and small. Their discovery, and effective use, can make one's journey easier.

Pillaging costs only 1 [ICON_Movement] Movement point. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This ancient ring, engraved with a large green flower, is of unknown origin. [NEWLINE]Hastens the regeneration of stamina(Reduce the Movement cost of Pillaging).

When defeating an enemy unit, gain [ICON_Faith] Faith equal to 50% that unit's base [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The serpent is an imperfect dragon and symbol of the Undead. Its habit of devouring prey even larger than itself has led to an association with gluttony. [NEWLINE]This silver ring, engraved with the serpent, rewards its wearer with additional souls(Faith) for each kill.

When defeating an enemy unit, gain [ICON_Gold] Gold equal to 100% that unit's base [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The serpent is an imperfect dragon and symbol of the Undead. Its habit of devouring prey even larger than itself has led to an association with gluttony. [NEWLINE]This gold ring, engraved with the serpent, boosts its wearer's item discovery, so that more items(Gold) can be amassed.

Range Unit Support Equipment. +1 [ICON_Range] Range. +1 sight range. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]One of the special rings granted to the four knights of Gwyn, The Hawk Ring belongs to Hawkeye Gough, who led the Greatarchers. [NEWLINE]Boosts bow range, so that arrows fly like they were shot by Gough's great bow, which took down high-flying dragons.

2x flanking bonus. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]One of the special rings granted to the four knights of Gwyn. The Hornet Ring belonged to the Lord's Blade Ciaran. [NEWLINE]By boosting critical attacks, its wearer can annihilate foes, as Ciaran's dagger laid waste to Lord Gwyn's enemies.

Range Unit Support Equipment. +1 [ICON_Range] Range and +5 [ICON_Ranged] Range Strength. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A special ring granted to only the most accomplished sorcerers at the Vinheim Dragon School. [NEWLINE]The ring is engraved with an everlasting dragon, and boosts the strength of sorceries.

Anti-air support Equipment. Provides 100 anti air strength cover from air and nuclear attacks up to 1 hex away from the Equipment. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Stoneplates, the symbol of a true knight, grant the strength to face various hardships. [NEWLINE]The blue stoneplate symbolizes souls, and boost defense against magic(Air).

+6 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This ring belonged to the Knight King Rendal. It grants its wearer protection by boosting defense against physical attacks. [NEWLINE]Of the many legends surrounding the Knight King Rendal, one of the more well-known speaks of his standing down a giant drake and slashing it to pieces.

Heal up to 25 hit points when eliminate a unit. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]According to legend, this ring contains the spirit of the evil eye, a dark beast which assaulted Astora. [NEWLINE]The strength of the evil eye does not waver, and HP is absorbed from fallen enemies.

All terrain costs 1 [ICON_Movement] Movement. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This iron ring was used to shackle the guilty. It is terribly rusted, and faintly stained with blood. [NEWLINE]Those who find this strange ring to their liking will be pleased to find it easier to gain footing on poor ground such as swamps.

Only adjacent enemy units can reveal equipped unit. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Those who befriend Alvina are given this mysterious ring. It resembles a pearl with its robust pure-white fog. [NEWLINE]This ring camouflages its wearer's presence, helping to prevent detection.

-15 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength but +100% combat experience to equipped Unit. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A ring enchanted by the orange eye of Kalameet, the bringer of calamity. Doubles damage received by its wearer. [NEWLINE]A useless ring befitting of no finger. Best left unknown, or at least well hidden.

+50 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength. Auto Heal. +1 Movement. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This ring symbolizes Knight Artorias' covenant with the beasts of the Abyss. [NEWLINE]Its wearer, like Artorias himself, can traverse the abyss.
+{1_Amount} [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending range attack.
+{1_Amount} [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending melee attack.
+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending vs. city attacks.
+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending in Woods, Jungle, Hills, or Marsh.
+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when occupying a district or Fort.
+50 [ICON_Strength] Combat Bonus from Covenant Of Artoria's.
+50 [ICON_Strength] Combat Bonus from the Bless of Lord's Blade Ciaran.
+10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength vs. units in districts.
+1 Movement. Can move after attacking if [ICON_Movement] Movement points remain.
No [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength and [ICON_Movement] Movement penalty when attacking from sea or river. Not affected by ZOC.
+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength. +1 additional attack per turn if unit has not moved. -1 Movement.
+10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking. -5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending.

Soul of a long-lost Fire Keeper. [NEWLINE]Each Fire Keeper is a corporeal manifestation of her bonfire, and a draw for the humanity which is offered to her. Her soul is gnawed by infinite humanity, and can boost the power of precious Estus Flasks. [NEWLINE]Reinforced Estus Flasks capture denser Estus, allowing for increased restoration of HP. [NEWLINE]Unit get 10 extra HP healing.

Soul of the Ash Maiden, Fire Keeper of Firelink Shrine. [NEWLINE]A Fire Keeper's soul is a draw for humanity, and held within their bosoms, below just a thin layer of skin, are swarms of humanity that writhe and squirm. Was the Ash Maiden locked in this dark prison for some transgression, or by her own will? [NEWLINE]Unit get 10 extra HP healing.

Soul of a Daughter of Chaos, Fire Keeper of Quelaag's Domain. [NEWLINE]A Fire Keeper's soul is a draw for humanity, and held within their bosoms, below just a thin layer of skin, are swarms of humanity that writhe and squirm. To her, the countless eggs which appeared were cradles for each tiny humanity. [NEWLINE]Unit get 10 extra HP healing.

Soul of the Darkmoon Knightess, Fire Keeper of Anor Londo. [NEWLINE]A Fire Keeper's soul is a draw for humanity, and held within their bosoms, below just a thin layer of skin, are swarms of humanity that writhe and squirm. Her brass armor serves to disguise this ghastly form. [NEWLINE]Unit get 10 extra HP healing.

Soul of Ornstein, Dragonslayer Knight who guards the cathedral in the forsaken city of Anor Londo. [NEWLINE]Special beings have special souls. Lord Gwyn granted this soul to his four most trusted knights. [NEWLINE]Use to acquire a huge amount of souls, or to create a unique weapon.

Get Dragon Tooth when Project complete. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Created from an everlasting dragon tooth. Legendary great hammer of Havel the Rock. [NEWLINE]The dragon tooth will never break as it is harder than stone, and it can destory wall by only one hit.

Soul of Lord Gwyn's Knight Artorias, who was consumed by the Abyss. [NEWLINE]The Legend that Artorias repelled the Abyss only told half of the story. It seems that he was defeated, and his honor preserved, by some unsung hero, who is the true victor over the Abyss.

Soul of Sif the Great Grey Wolf, who guards the grave of Artorias the Abysswalker. [NEWLINE]Special beings have special souls. [NEWLINE]Use the soul of Sif, who inherited the divine knightsword, to acquire a huge amount of souls, or create a unique weapon.

Get Gough's Greatbow (Ranged Weapon) when Project complete. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Greatbow used by Hawkeye Gough, of Lord Gwyn's Four Knights, for dragon slaying. [NEWLINE]This bow is larger than even those used by the famed Dragonslayers. Only their leader, Gough, had the strength to handle it.

Get Gold Tracer (Ranged Weapon) when Project complete. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Curved sword used by the Lord's Blade Ciaran, one of Gwyn's Four Knights. [NEWLINE]Ciaran brandishes her sword in a mesmerizing dance, etching the darkness with dire streaks of gold.

Get Covenant of Artorias when Project complete. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This ring symbolizes Knight Artorias' covenant with the beasts of the Abyss. [NEWLINE]Its wearer, like Artorias himself, can traverse the abyss.

Ah! Firekeeper —— the servent of Flame. The first flame has burnt for thousand years. Now it requires a new lord to link the fire.[NEWLINE]Under the name of Gwen, show undead heroes the way to be the Lord of Cinder.[NEWLINE]Keep the light remain and suppress the Abyss!
Welcome to the bonfire, Unkindled One. [NEWLINE]I am a Fire Keeper. [NEWLINE]I tend to the flame, and tend to light.
Welcome to the bonfire, Unkindled One.
I'm sorry， but you will never be one of the lords.
Are you willing to Link the Flame with me?
Since you are not tend to Link the Flame, I think there is no need to continue this conversation.
I'm truly sorry but know'st thou not? I cannot die.
I'm truly sorry, but your soul is necessary for Link the Flame.
You have betrayed your own errand, shame on you!
Of course not. Please take these things away. Before I am drawn into the darkness. Seduced by the thin light, and the awful betrayal.
The First Flame quickly fades. Darkness will shortly settle. [NEWLINE]But one day, tiny flames will dance across the darkness. Like embers, linked by lords past.
Likes civilizations that have explored less of the map than itself and tries to find all natural wonders.
